mapper.select: select tjrq, xzqh, xzqhmc, sl from rpt_aqjg_nb_test where tjrq =#{tjrq} order by sl desc
select sum(dwsl) from rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl where tjrq =#{tjrq}
select jbdjdm, jbdjmc, sum(dwsl) sl from rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl where tjrq =#{tjrq} and jbdjdm in ('1','2','3','7','8','9') GROUP BY jbdjmc,jbdjdm ORDER BY sl desc

SELECT a.tjrq, a.ssfjmc, a.num, ceiling(a.num/b.totleNum*100) as percent from (select tjrq,ssfjmc,sum(dwsl) num from rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl where tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfjdm not in('320597000000','320598000000') GROUP BY ssfjmc,tjrq ORDER BY ssfjmc) as a LEFT JOIN (SELECT tjrq,sum(dwsl) totleNum from rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfjdm not in('320597000000','320598000000') GROUP BY tjrq) b on a.tjrq = b.tjrq ORDER BY a.ssfjmc

SELECT a.tjrq, a.totleNum, b.ssfjmc, b.jbdjdm, b.jbdjmc, b.sl, ceiling(b.sl/a.totleNum*100) as percent from (SELECT tjrq,sum(dwsl) as totleNum from rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl where tjrq =#{tjrq} and jbdjdm in ('1','2','3','8') GROUP BY tjrq) a LEFT JOIN (select tjrq,ssfjmc,jbdjdm,jbdjmc,sum(dwsl) sl from rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl where tjrq =#{tjrq} and jbdjdm in ('1','2','3','8') GROUP BY jbdjmc,jbdjdm,tjrq,ssfjmc ORDER BY ssfjmc,jbdjdm) b on a.tjrq = b.tjrq

SELECT b.tjrq, b.ssfjmc,b.ssfjdm, b.zd, a.totleNum, ceiling(b.zd/a.totleNum*100) as percent FROM (SELECT tjrq,ssfjmc,ssfjdm,sum(dwsl) as totleNum FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl" WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') GROUP BY tjrq,ssfjmc,ssfjdm) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT tjrq,ssfjmc,ssfjdm,sum(dwsl) AS zd FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl" WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') and jbdjdm in ('1','2','3','8') GROUP BY tjrq,ssfjmc,ssfjdm ORDER BY zd DESC) b on a.ssfjdm = b.ssfjdm WHERE a.ssfjdm NOT IN ('320597000000','320598000000') AND a.ssfjdm IS NOT NULL ORDER BY totleNum DESC

SELECT case when position('分局' in a.sspcsmc) > 0 then split_part(a.sspcsmc, '分局', 2) else split_part(a.sspcsmc, '公安局', 2) end sspcsmc, b.zd, a.totleNum, ceiling(b.zd/a.totleNum*100) as percent FROM (SELECT sspcsmc, sspcsdm, sum(dwsl) as totleNum FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl" WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND sspcsmc IS NOT NULL AND sspcsdm IS NOT NULL AND ssfjmc like '%' || #{name} ||'%' GROUP BY sspcsmc, sspcsdm) a left JOIN (SELECT sspcsmc,sum(dwsl) as zd FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl" WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND sspcsmc IS NOT NULL AND sspcsdm IS NOT NULL AND jbdjdm in ('1','2','3','8') and ssfjmc like '%' || #{name} ||'%' GROUP BY sspcsmc) b on a.sspcsmc = b.sspcsmc WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY totleNum DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT jclxmc, sum(jcsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_jcsl WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} GROUP BY jclxmc ORDER BY jclxmc
SELECT sum(yhsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_yhsl WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq}

SELECT a.jbdjdm, a.jbdjmc, a.dwsl, a.yhsl, ceiling(a.dwsl/(a.dwsl + a.yhsl)*100) dwPer, ceiling(a.yhsl/(a.dwsl + a.yhsl)*100) yhPer FROM (SELECT jbdjdm,jbdjmc,sum(yhdwsl) dwsl, sum(yhsl) yhsl FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_yhsl" WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND jbdjdm IN ('1','2','3','8') GROUP BY jbdjdm,jbdjmc) a
SELECT jbdjdm, jbdjmc, sum(yhdwsl) dwsl, sum(yhsl) yhsl FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_yhsl" WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND jbdjdm in('1','2','3','8','9') GROUP BY jbdjdm,jbdjmc order by dwsl DESC

WITH lzfxtj AS ( SELECT ssfjmc, ssfjdm, SUM ( jcsl ) FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_jcsl" WHERE tjrq = to_char( CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) AND dwlx = '重要设施' AND jclxmc = '专项检查' AND ssfjdm NOT IN ( '320597000000', '320598000000') AND ssfjmc IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ssfjmc, ssfjdm ORDER BY SUM DESC ) SELECT T .ssfjmc, CASE WHEN J.SUM IS NOT NULL THEN J.SUM ELSE 0 END SUM FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_jcsl T LEFT JOIN lzfxtj J ON T.ssfjdm = J.ssfjdm WHERE T.ssfjdm NOT IN ( '320597000000', '320598000000') AND T.ssfjmc IS NOT NULL GROUP BY T.ssfjmc, T.ssfjdm, J.SUM ORDER BY SUM DESC

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsmc) > 0 then split_part(sspcsmc, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsmc, '公安局', 2) end sspcsmc, sum(jcsl) FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_jcsl" WHERE tjrq= to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcsdm is not null and sspcsmc is not null and ssfjmc like '%' || #{name} ||'%' and dwlx='重要设施' AND jclxmc='专项检查' GROUP BY sspcsmc ORDER BY sum DESC LIMIT 10

WITH temp as ( SELECT ssfjmc,ssfjdm,jbdjdm, COALESCE(SUM(dwsl),'0') sjsnum FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ssfjdm not in('320597000000','320598000000') and jbdjdm in ('1','2','3','8') GROUP BY jbdjdm,ssfjmc,ssfjdm ) select ssfjmc,ssfjdm, '省级治安重点单位' as sjname, sum(case when jbdjdm='1' then sjsnum else 0 end) as sjsnum, '市级治安重点单位' as sname, sum(case when jbdjdm='2' then sjsnum else 0 end) as ssnum, '县市、区级治安重点单位' as xname, sum(case when jbdjdm='3' then sjsnum else 0 end) as xsnum, '社区关注单位' as sqname, sum(case when jbdjdm='8' then sjsnum else 0 end) as sqsnum, ceiling(sum(sjsnum)/(select sum(sjsnum) from temp)*100) as percent from temp group by ssfjmc,ssfjdm
SELECT sum(dwsl) FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl" WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq}
SELECT qy, jbdj, jbdjmc, zddwcyrys FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwtj WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} and jbdj='1'
SELECT sum(zdgcdws) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_hdgctj WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq}
SELECT sum(tjsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_scaqsglatj WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq}
SELECT sum(yhcldwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhdwtj WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq}
SELECT lbmc, sum(dwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} group by lbmc
SELECT ssfjmc, sum(dwsl) as num FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfjmc IS NOT NULL group by ssfjmc order by num desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsmc) > 0 then split_part(sspcsmc, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsmc, '公安局', 2) end sspcsmc, sum(dwsl) as num FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcsdm is not null and sspcsmc is not null and ssfjmc like '%' || #{name} ||'%' group by sspcsmc order by num desc limit 10
SELECT ssfjmc, sum(yhdwsl) as num FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_yhsl WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfjmc IS NOT NULL group by ssfjmc order by num desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsmc) > 0 then split_part(sspcsmc, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsmc, '公安局', 2) end sspcsmc, sum(yhdwsl) as num FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_yhsl WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') sspcsmc is not null sspcsdm is not null and ssfjmc like '%' || #{name} ||'%' group by sspcsmc order by num desc limit 10
SELECT ssfxjname, sum(cgjc_qypcssl) as cgnum FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfxjname IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ssfxjname order by cgnum desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsname) > 0 then split_part(sspcsname, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsname, '公安局', 2) end sspcsname, cgjc_qypcssl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcs is not null and sspcsname is not null and ssfxjname like '%' || #{name} ||'%' group by sspcsname,cgjc_qypcssl order by cgjc_qypcssl desc limit 10
SELECT ssfxjname, sum(zxjc_qypcssl) as zxnum FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfxjname IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ssfxjname order by zxnum desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsname) > 0 then split_part(sspcsname, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsname, '公安局', 2) end sspcsname, zxjc_qypcssl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcsname is not null and sspcs is not null and ssfxjname like '%' || #{name} ||'%' group by sspcsname,zxjc_qypcssl order by zxjc_qypcssl desc limit 10
SELECT ssfxjname, sum(qsjc_qypcssl) as qsnum FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfxjname IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ssfxjname order by qsnum desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsname) > 0 then split_part(sspcsname, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsname, '公安局', 2) end sspcsname, qsjc_qypcssl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcsname is not null and sspcs is not null and ssfxjname like '%' || #{name} ||'%' group by sspcsname,qsjc_qypcssl order by qsjc_qypcssl desc limit 10
SELECT ssfxjname, sum(zdjc_qypcssl) as zdnum FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfxjname IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ssfxjname order by zdnum desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsname) > 0 then split_part(sspcsname, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsname, '公安局', 2) end sspcsname, zdjc_qypcssl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcsname is not null and sspcs is not null and ssfxjname like '%' || #{name} ||'%' group by sspcsname,zdjc_qypcssl order by zdjc_qypcssl desc limit 10
SELECT ssfxjname, sum(dwsl1) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfxjname IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ssfxjname order by sum desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsname) > 0 then split_part(sspcsname, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsname, '公安局', 2) end sspcsname, dwsl1 FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcsname is not null and sspcs is not null and ssfxjname like '%' || #{name} ||'%' group by sspcsname,dwsl1 order by dwsl1 desc limit 10
SELECT ssfxjname, (sum(dwsl1)+sum(dwsl)) as num FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq =#{tjrq} AND ssfxjname IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ssfxjname order by num desc

SELECT case when position('分局' in sspcsname) > 0 then split_part(sspcsname, '分局', 2) else split_part(sspcsname, '公安局', 2) end sspcsname, (dwsl+dwsl1) as num FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_aqjctj_pcs WHERE tjrq = to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and sspcsname is not null and sspcs is not null and ssfxjname=#{name} group by sspcsname,dwsl,dwsl1 order by num desc limit 10
SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' and glbm like '%2%'
SELECT gljcjg, gljcjgmc, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' AND gljcjg in('1','2','3') and glbm like '%2%' GROUP BY gljcjg,gljcjgmc ORDER BY gljcjg
SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' and jclx='4'
SELECT sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' and jclx='4' and clzt != '6'
SELECT gljcjg, gljcjgmc, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' AND jclx='4' AND glbm like '%2%' AND gljcjg in ('100','200','300') group by gljcjg,gljcjgmc
SELECT jclx, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' AND jclx='4' AND clzt='3' GROUP BY jclx
SELECT gljcjg, gljcjgmc, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' AND jclx='4' and glbm like '%2%' and gljcjg='101' GROUP BY gljcjg,gljcjgmc
SELECT gljcjg, gljcjgmc, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' AND jclx='4' and glbm like '%2%' and gljcjg='201' GROUP BY gljcjg,gljcjgmc
SELECT tjrq, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' and jclx !='4' and clzt = '6' AND gljcjg='1' group by tjrq
SELECT tjrq, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' and jclx ='4' and clzt = '6' AND gljcjg in('0',NULL) group by tjrq
SELECT tjrq, sum(sl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhcllctj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND gllx='1' and jclx ='4' and clzt = '6' AND gljcjg not in ('0',NULL) group by tjrq
SELECT qy, sum(zddwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwtj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND jbdj in('1','2','3','8') AND ssfxj NOT IN ( '320597000000', '320598000000') AND qy IS NOT NULL GROUP BY qy ORDER BY sum desc

SELECT a.qy, a.num, b.sum FROM (SELECT qy, sum(zddwsl) num FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwtj" WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} AND jbdj in('1','2','3','8') GROUP BY qy) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT qy, sum(zddwsl) sum FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwtj" WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} GROUP BY qy) b ON a.qy = b.qy ORDER BY num desc LIMIT 5
SELECT jc_year, sum(yhcldwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhdwtj WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq} GROUP BY jc_year ORDER BY jc_year

SELECT a.ssfjmc, a.addnum, b.totlenum FROM (SELECT ssfjmc,sum(dwsl) addnum FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl" WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY ssfjmc ORDER BY ssfjmc) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT ssfjmc,sum(dwsl) totlenum FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl" GROUP BY ssfjmc ORDER BY ssfjmc) b ON a.ssfjmc = b.ssfjmc
SELECT sum(dwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl WHERE tjrq=#{tjrq}

select b.ssfjmc, b.num, ceiling(b.num/a.totlenum*100) as percent FROM (SELECT tjrq,sum(dwsl) totlenum FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY tjrq) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT tjrq,ssfjmc,sum(dwsl) num FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY ssfjmc,tjrq ORDER BY ssfjmc) b on a.tjrq = b.tjrq
SELECT COALESCE(fxjmc,'0')ssfjmc, sum(zdgcdws) zdnum, sum(qywjzs) wjznum, sum(qyyjzs) jznum FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_hdgctj" WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY fxjmc ORDER BY fxjmc

WITH sydwsl AS ( SELECT nf || yf AS nfyf, ssfjmc, dwsl, jbdjdm, yf FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) SELECT nfyf as tjrq, yf, sum(dwsl) dwsl FROM sydwsl WHERE 1=1 AND nfyf >= #{ltnf} AND nfyf <= #{gtnf} GROUP BY yf,nfyf
SELECT COALESCE(nf,'0') nf, sum(dwsl) FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl" WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY nf ORDER BY nf

WITH sydwsl AS ( SELECT nf || yf AS nfyf, ssfjmc,yf,dwsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) SELECT nfyf as tjrq, yf, sum(dwsl) dwsl FROM sydwsl WHERE 1=1 AND nfyf >= #{ltnf} AND nfyf <= #{gtnf} AND ssfjmc=#{name} GROUP BY yf,nfyf
SELECT nf, sum(dwsl) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_lzfxtj_sydwsl WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND ssfjmc=#{name} GROUP BY nf ORDER BY nf

SELECT a.*, COALESCE ( b.jcsl, 0 ) count FROM dept_table a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ssfjdm, sum( jcsl ) jcsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zdsszt WHERE SUBSTR( tjrq, 1, 4 ) = #{year} and jclxmc = '主动检查' GROUP BY ssfjdm ) b ON ( a.dept_code = b.ssfjdm ) ORDER BY COALESCE ( b.jcsl, 0 ) DESC

WITH zddwjcfx AS ( SELECT nf, ssfxjmc AS ssfjmc, SUM ( jcsl ) jcsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwjcfx WHERE jclx = '1' AND tjrq LIKE '%' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'MM-dd') || '%' AND nf = #{nf} AND ssfxj NOT IN ( '320597000000', '320598000000' ) GROUP BY nf, ssfxjmc ) SELECT A .nf, A.ssfjmc, jcsl, b.zl, CEILING ( A.jcsl / b.zl * 100 ) AS percent FROM zddwjcfx A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT nf, SUM ( jcsl ) AS zl FROM zddwjcfx GROUP BY nf ) b ON A.nf = b.nf ORDER BY a.ssfjmc

WITH zddwjcfx AS ( SELECT nf, ssfxj, ssfxjmc AS ssfjmc, jczt, jcsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zddwjcfx WHERE 1 = 1 AND tjrq LIKE '%' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'MM-dd') || '%' AND nf = #{nf} AND jclx = '3' AND ssfxj NOT IN ( '320597000000', '320598000000' ) ) SELECT ssfxj, ssfjmc, djc, yjc, qjc, djc + yjc + qjc AS zl FROM ( SELECT ssfxj, ssfjmc, COALESCE ( ( SELECT SUM ( jcsl ) FROM zddwjcfx WHERE jczt = '0' AND ssfxj = T.ssfxj ), 0 ) AS djc, COALESCE ( ( SELECT SUM ( jcsl ) FROM zddwjcfx WHERE jczt = '1' AND ssfxj = T.ssfxj ), 0 ) AS yjc, COALESCE ( ( SELECT SUM ( jcsl ) FROM zddwjcfx WHERE jczt = '2' AND ssfxj = T.ssfxj ), 0 ) AS qjc FROM zddwjcfx T GROUP BY ssfxj, ssfjmc ) zddwjcfx GROUP BY ssfxj, ssfjmc, djc, yjc, qjc

WITH zysssl AS ( SELECT tjrq, SUM (dwsl) dwsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl WHERE 1=1 AND tjrq IN ( SELECT tjrq FROM ( SELECT tjrq, ROW_NUMBER () OVER ( PARTITION BY date_trunc( 'month', to_date( tjrq, 'yyyyMM' ) ) ORDER BY tjrq ) AS ROW FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl ORDER BY tjrq DESC ) AS zysssl WHERE 1=1 AND ROW = '1' )
AND ssfjmc IN
#{item}
GROUP BY tjrq ORDER BY tjrq ) SELECT SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 5, 2 ) AS yf, tjrq, dwsl FROM zysssl WHERE 1=1 AND tjrq >= #{ltnf} AND tjrq <= #{gtnf} ORDER BY tjrq DESC, yf DESC

SELECT SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 1, 4 ) || '年' AS yen , SUM ( dwsl ) dwsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 1, 4 ) BETWEEN ( to_char( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + '-10year', 'yyyy' ) ) AND ( to_char( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy' ) )
AND ssfjmc IN
#{item}
GROUP BY SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 1, 4 ) ORDER BY yen
SELECT COALESCE(nf,'0') as nf, sum(zdgcdws)+sum(qyyjzs)+sum(qywjzs) as num FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_hdgctj" WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND fxjmc=#{name} GROUP BY nf ORDER BY nf
SELECT COALESCE(nf,'0') as nf, sum(zdgcdws)+sum(qyyjzs)+sum(qywjzs) as num FROM "rpt_aqjg_zdmb_hdgctj" WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY nf ORDER BY nf
SELECT SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 1, 4 ) || '年' AS yen , SUM ( dwsl ) dwsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl WHERE ssfjmc=#{name} GROUP BY SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 1, 4 ) ORDER BY yen
SELECT SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 1, 4 ) AS nf , SUM ( dwsl ) dwsl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl GROUP BY SUBSTRING ( tjrq, 1, 4 ) ORDER BY nf

SELECT a.*, COALESCE (b.zgl,0) zgl, COALESCE (b.wzgl,0) wzgl FROM dept_table a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ssfxj, sum( CASE
WHEN ( clzt = '6' AND jclx != '4' AND gljcjg = '1' ) OR ( jclx = '4' AND clzt = '6' AND ( gljcjg = '0' OR gljcjg IS NULL ) ) THEN yhsl ELSE 0 END ) zgl, sum( CASE WHEN jclx = '4' AND (clzt != '6' or clzt is null) AND ( gljcjg != '0' OR gljcjg IS NOT NULL ) THEN yhsl ELSE 0 END ) wzgl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhdwtj where jc_year is not null and jc_month is not null
and gljcjgmc IN
#{re}
GROUP BY ssfxj ) b ON a.dept_code = b.ssfxj

select b.a datestr, COALESCE ( c.zgl, 0 ) zgl, COALESCE ( c.wzgl, 0 ) wzgl from ( select regexp_split_to_table(${monthStr},',') a ) b left join ( SELECT concat(jc_year,'-',jc_month) datestr, sum( CASE
WHEN ( clzt = '6' AND jclx != '4' AND gljcjg = '1' ) OR ( jclx = '4' AND clzt = '6' AND ( gljcjg = '0' OR gljcjg IS NULL ) ) THEN yhsl ELSE 0 END ) zgl, sum( CASE WHEN jclx = '4' AND (clzt != '6' or clzt is null) AND ( gljcjg != '0' OR gljcjg IS NOT NULL ) THEN yhsl ELSE 0 END ) wzgl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhdwtj WHERE 1=1 and jc_year is not null and jc_month is not null
and ssfxj = (select dept_code from dept_table where dept_name=#{area})
and gljcjgmc IN
#{re}
GROUP BY jc_year, jc_month ) c on b.a=c.datestr

SELECT jc_year datestr, sum( CASE
WHEN ( clzt = '6' AND jclx != '4' AND gljcjg = '1' ) OR ( jclx = '4' AND clzt = '6' AND ( gljcjg = '0' OR gljcjg IS NULL ) ) THEN yhsl ELSE 0 END ) zgl, sum( CASE WHEN jclx = '4' AND (clzt != '6' or clzt is null) AND ( gljcjg != '0' OR gljcjg IS NOT NULL ) THEN yhsl ELSE 0 END ) wzgl FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_yhdwtj WHERE 1=1 and jc_year is not null
and ssfxj = (select dept_code from dept_table where dept_name=#{area})
GROUP BY jc_year order by jc_year

WITH hdgctj AS ( SELECT nf || yf AS nfyf, fxjmc, zdgcdws, qyyjzs, qywjzs,yf FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_hdgctj WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) SELECT nfyf as tjrq, yf, sum(zdgcdws)+sum(qyyjzs)+sum(qywjzs) dwsl FROM hdgctj WHERE 1=1 AND nfyf >= #{ltnf} AND nfyf <= #{gtnf} GROUP BY yf,nfyf
SELECT tjrq, COALESCE(sum(dwsl),0) dwsl, SUBSTRING(tjrq,5,6) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl WHERE 1=1 AND tjrq >= #{ltnf} AND tjrq <= #{gtnf} GROUP BY tjrq

WITH hdgctj AS ( SELECT nf || yf AS nfyf, fxjmc, zdgcdws, qyyjzs, qywjzs,yf FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_hdgctj WHERE tjrq=to_char(CURRENT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) SELECT nfyf as tjrq, yf, sum(zdgcdws)+sum(qyyjzs)+sum(qywjzs) dwsl FROM hdgctj WHERE 1=1 AND nfyf >= #{ltnf} AND nfyf <= #{gtnf} AND fxjmc=#{name} GROUP BY yf,nfyf
SELECT tjrq, COALESCE(sum(dwsl),0) dwsl, SUBSTRING(tjrq,5,6) FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zysssl_zl WHERE 1=1 AND tjrq >= #{ltnf} AND tjrq <= #{gtnf} AND ssfjmc=#{name} GROUP BY tjrq

SELECT a.dept_name, (COALESCE(yjc,0)+COALESCE(djc,0)+COALESCE(ycq,0)+COALESCE(xfjc,0)) jcsl, COALESCE(yjc,0) yjc, COALESCE(djc,0) djc, COALESCE(ycq,0) ycq, COALESCE(xfjc,0) xfjc FROM dept_table a LEFT JOIN (SELECT ssfjdm, SUBSTRING(tjrq,0,5) nf, max(tjrq) max, sum(case when jcztdm = '1' then jcsl else 0 end) as yjc, sum(case when jcztdm = '0' then jcsl else 0 end) as djc, sum(case when jcztmc = '已超期' then jcsl else 0 end) as ycq, sum(case when jcztmc != '已取消' then jcsl else 0 end) as xfjc FROM rpt_aqjg_zdmb_zdsszt WHERE jclxdm ='3' AND SUBSTRING(tjrq,0,5)=#{titleDateType} GROUP BY ssfjdm,SUBSTRING(tjrq,0,5)) b on a.dept_code = b.ssfjdm
